Segment.name: ZR
Segment.comment: To transmit identity and reference information of the waybill

Field.name: EquipmentInitial1
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber1
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: WaybillNumber
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: InterlineSettlementSystemStatusActionOrDisputeCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying action to be taken or current status of a revenue waybill

Field.name: InterlineSettlementSystemStatusActionOrDisputeCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying action to be taken or current status of a revenue waybill

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: CorrectionIndicator
Field.comment: Code used to indicate that the transaction set contains information which corrects previous information

Field.name: EquipmentNumberCheckDigit
Field.comment: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial2
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber2
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

SyntaxNote.name: P0405
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZR04 or ZR05 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1516
SyntaxNote.comment: If either ZR15 or ZR16 is present, then the other is required.
